businessInfo.name: Jaipur Delight Bakes
businessInfo.slogan: Baked with Love, Served with Joy

content.heroSubtitle: Experience the taste of homemade delights
content.aboutSection: Jaipur Delight Bakes offers you a tasty range of home-style baked goods, crafted lovingly by local artisans, using traditional recipes and the finest ingredients. Visit us for a sweet taste of Jaipur!

initialProducts.name: Classic Butter Croissant
initialProducts.description: Flaky, buttery, and light, our classic croissants are a perfect start to your day.

initialProducts.name: Artisanal Sourdough Bread
initialProducts.description: Our sourdough bread is made using a traditional slow ferment process for a deliciously tangy flavor and chewy texture.

initialProducts.name: Rajasthani Ghevar Cake
initialProducts.description: Indulge in this traditional Rajasthani treat, crafted with meticulous care to offer you a taste of the local heritage.

logoPrompt: a minimalist logo of a stylized cake and bread, vector art
